scripts.say: Have a safe trip home, everyone~!
So, the STAR assessment is zero? Pleasantly calm, for a change.
I must express my gratitude to you for setting up this joint exercise area for us. The girls all wanted a little practice.
Of course, that includes me as well. I have heard many a tale about your heroic deeds, Enterprise, and I was hoping to test your skill for myself.
You don't need to be so flattering, Wales. The Eagle Union stands with its allies, and we're happy to have the opportunity to practice with you.
To tell the truth, I've been waiting for a chance to polish up my skills, too.
Very well, then let's tone down the formalities from here on. The Royal Navy will fight with all it's got, and we hope you will, too.
Let's find out if the Eagle Union's carrier fleet is as amazing as they say!
That's more like it. Eagle Union fleet, let's get ready! Hooyah!
